definition: to be away for the summer holidays/to spend a holiday at a summer resort/to prevent sunstroke
to avoid/to shun/to flee/to escape/to keep away from/to leave/to hide from
heat/hot weather/summer heat

sentences.english: It is one of the best summer resorts in China.
sentences.chinese: 它是中国最理想的避暑胜地之一。

sentences.english: He read many books, he went to the theatre, and in the summer he stayed in the country for six weeks.
sentences.chinese: 他读了许多书，去看过戏，在乡间避暑待了六个星期。

sentences.english: The island is noted for its summer resort.
sentences.chinese: 这个岛以避暑胜地而著称。

sentences.english: In summer, Longqing Gorge is a summer resort in Beijing suburb.
sentences.chinese: 龙庆峡夏季是京郊避暑胜地。

sentences.english: She repaired to Qingdao for the summer.
The expensive sun is all the hot springs of China, the world go to summer resort it all.
sentences.chinese: 贵阳是中国的温泉之都，世界的避暑之都。

sentences.english: This place has become a famous summer resort.
sentences.chinese: 这个地方已成为一个避暑胜地。

sentences.english: In ancient times, everyone is already Yong Nam toured the famous summer resort destination.
sentences.chinese: 在古代，青秀山已经是邕南著名的避暑游览胜地。

sentences.english: They would abide in the summer house.
sentences.chinese: 他们宁愿住在避暑别墅里。

sentences.english: Is you enjoys the cool air the summer vacation best choice.
sentences.chinese: 是您纳凉避暑的最佳选择。

sentences.english: In summer, Songhua Lake is the famous summer resort.
sentences.chinese: 夏季的松花湖，是著名的避暑胜地。

sentences.english: Drinking coffee on Edgware Road close to many of London's best known stores, he said he has been coming to Britain for the past decade to shop and escape the searing summer heat.
sentences.chinese: 他说，在过去的十年里他一直来伦敦购物和避暑。

sentences.english: It's so hot, but I know where to go to stay Cool.
sentences.chinese: 天气真热但我知道该去哪儿避暑。

sentences.english: The Summer Resort is vast and magnificent, which reflects the broad-minded ideals of Emperor Kangxi and Emperor Qianlong.
sentences.chinese: 避暑山庄园林宏伟阔大，体现了康乾两帝的宽阔胸怀。

sentences.english: Officials said the advertising would accelerate as the legislators returned home for the summer.
sentences.chinese: 官方表示这些宣传只会促进立法委员回家避暑。

sentences.english: There are many summer resorts in the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 在山里有许多避暑胜地。
